name: Beyond the Void
detailed_description:
Beyond the Void (BTV) brings the MOBA genre with its RTS origins back together in a space universe in perpetual motion. Beyond the Void is a unique combination of strategy, action and competition in 1 versus 1. Come into our science fiction universe and experience the thrill of being a captain! Pick your mothership and draft its skills. You’ve got only one true goal: To forge a strong fleet and conquer your opponent’s home planet! Now, Captain, board your mothership, balance your strategy and resources and lead the war… Beyond the void!


  • Challenge your friends to 1vs1 online matches, train against the AI, or compete in ranked games.
  • First, DRAFT the skills of your mothership to fit your strategy. Collect resources and conquer neutral planets as you forge your fleet and improve your mothership’s statistics.
  • Then, DESTROY your opponent’s fleet as you lead your powerful army through an epic space war. Your skills as a player are your best tool.
  • Last, DOMINATE the game, defeat the enemy by conquering their base planet. Your victory is the first step toward building your reputation amongst the BtV community. Fight for the top rank.

To support our continuous cycle of play/iterate/improve, use the “Report a bug” button in the game or mention it in the “Feedback” channel on our Discord. We’ll use your feedback for our official release.
Let’s get to know each other on social media and discuss game polishing!

The BTV Team.

The BTV Team.
short_description: Beyond the Void is a Free to Play Multiplayer Online Battle Arena (MOBA) in 1 versus 1! Put on your captain suit, challenge an opponent, select your mothership and its abilities, develop your fleet and conquer the enemy's mother planet. Will you be able to lead the war Beyond the Void?
supported_languages:
English*, French, Russian, German
*languages with full audio support
reviews:
“So what’s the vision behind the Beyond The Void initiative? Well, to create a “next-generation game culture” where players own the ecosystem as much the developers.”
Forbes

“Assets used in the game will be usable in other Blockchain games or non-gaming Blockchain related apps.”
Medium

““I liked the challenge of building a strategy to take control of the resources while pushing the lane””
Player - Insomnia Killarney

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Q9505 @ 2.80 GHz / AMD Athlon II X4 840 @ 3.10 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 5770 or NVIDIA GeForce GTS450 with 1GB VRAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 @ 3.10 GHz / AMD Phenom II X4 955 @ 3.10 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 6850 or NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 with 1GB VRAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 2.9 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 6950m with 1GB VRAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OSX 10.11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 2.9 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD R9 390m or NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750m
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
